comments.comment: Umbath maara porak neda ...? Headline eke hatiyata mama hithuwe karati kadenna nelanawa athi kiyala ea  girlsla denna kiyala. Ane bola . Ese unaanam thamai hari. Ea kohoma wethath ea gon pol buuruwa gana rate hamadenaatama waage thiththa wela thiyenne. Apith vote kara thamai oya gon wassa athulu aanduwata. Habai ea 2015 gaththu theeranaya gana pasu thaweemak thibunath rate minisun ekathu unoth onama deyak kalahaki bawa pennum kala. Ehidee rate thibu kaalaknni deshapaalanayak wenas kereemata hakiwuuwaasema  me dan inna kaalakanni balu haththawath palawaa hara nawa sudussek path kara ganeemata hakiyaawa thiyenawa. Eya esema karamu rate api sawoma ekwee. Mokada sadaakaalikai kiya sithaagena siti majara paalanayak thamai ea ekata ekathuwee palawaa hariye. wati wati yanna uthsaha karannaata pannarayak wewi kawadaahoo kelin sitagena gamanak yanna . Ese nomathiwa ekathana kunuwalema watee sitiyoth thawath pal wewee , kunuganda gagaha inna siduwewi sadahatama.
comments.author: Prashan Silva

replies.replyComment: @√áh√§thur√§ ƒê√Øl√§ksh√§k√§ Kage chanden awath president unata passe uuta oona deyak karanna thibba. Ranil lawai unge ponnayo ralai kelinma ain karala aluthenma set ekk daganna thibba uuta. Ai my3 ehema karanna bari une? Uu ponnaya nisa kisi responsibility ekak na. Dakkane kariya bomba gahuwa kiyala danagena thiyenne social media walin. Mehema ekek president wenna sudusuda? Mehema kiyanna kiyala kiwwe UNP ekenda? Na my3 kohomath pana nathi gaaniyek wagh minihek. Habai man ekak kiyannam mahinda muuta wada kelin decisions gatta. Habai Dan oya ekektawath meh rata karagena yanna ba kiyala therenawa athine. Eekai mulinma kiwwe katawath kade yannai, kawawath sudda karannai epa kiyala.

@√áh√§thur√§ ƒê√Øl√§ksh√§k√§ oya liyapu comment eka aaith poddak kiyawala balanna uba monada kiyala thibbe kiyala. My3 ta unp un hinda wada karanna bari una?? Mole koheda thiyenne oyage? Yako my3 president weddi president ta godak power eka thibba eeth minihata kondak thibbe na decisions ganna. Uu ranil ekka ekathu wela president ge power eka adu kara. Anthimata my3ta kisi palanayak nathi una. Yako rataka president kiwwama uu moda ponnayek wagh hasirenna ba. Mu karapu tharamak kare mole nathi wada. Unp nemei moka hitiyath konda pana thiyana ekek president una nam lankawa hoda thanakata genna thibba. Mama kade yanawa kiyalada ubata hithanne? Ah? Mun mokkuda mage kade yanna?
Methanama 3 denek innawa lajja nadda yako thopita
